The explosion seemed to catch S=
courge and the sweep slightly off guard. Instead of a surprised Rodimus, th=
ey found him ready and with missiles firing!

The missiles take out the rem=
ains of the door frame and shredding the wall. The resultant explosions kno=
cking the duo back.

"Full of surprises are we?" Scourge rasped as he quick=
ly came to his feet. "I always thought you Cybertronians were packing light=
." 

Scourge smiled as the Sweep next to him also clambered to his feet als=
o.

In unison they both dive behind some of the larger debris (ie consoles)=
 and  began firing energy blasts at Rodimus!

In the distance, in engineeri=
ng and the computer core four other sweeps hear Scourge's signal and begin =
making thir way toward the bridge.
